__e: I don't want you walking into an ambush.
Well, if it is, it's a pretty lousy one. If they ambush us, you can still take 'em out from down there.
When my platoon was ambushed I was caught in an explosion and when I woke up, some of my memory was wiped out and the doctors don't know if I'll ever get it back.
I'd rather seek him out than wait an ambush.
When soldiers here see men with guns, they fire, otherwise, they say, they run the risk of being ambushed.
Whatever it is, it all leads back to that ambush.
